thread.title: BRIEF-Infusystem Holdings Reports Interim CFO Will Leave Co At End Of Current Quarter

title: BRIEF-Infusystem Holdings Reports Interim CFO Will Leave Co At End Of Current Quarter

organizations.name: brief-infusystem holdings reports interim cfo will leave co

text:
15 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Infusystem Holdings Reports Interim CFO Will Leave Co At End Of Current Quarter Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Infusystem Holdings Inc: 
* INFUSYSTEM HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS INTERIM CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER WILL LEAVE COMPANY AT END OF CURRENT QUARTER 
* ‍INTERIM CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER, CHRISTOPHER DOWNS, HAS INFORMED COMPANY OF HIS DECISION TO RESIGN HIS POSITION WITH COMPANY​ 
* ‍TRENT SMITH, WILL ASSUME DOWNS‘S RESPONSIBILITIES AS TREASURER AND PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER​ 
* ‍COMPANY WILL IMMEDIATELY BEGIN A SEARCH FOR A NEW CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
